title: Upgrade to advanced professional website with second phone number and enhanced design

requirements.text: Add the second phone number '7358440081' alongside the existing '99624 42558' in the Contact section and Footer. Both numbers must be displayed as tappable tel: links on mobile devices.
acceptanceCriteria: Both phone numbers '99624 42558' and '7358440081' are visible in the Contact section.
Both numbers are rendered as <a href='tel:...'> links so they initiate a call on mobile.
Both numbers are also visible in the Footer.
Existing design and layout are not broken by adding the second number.

requirements.text: Redesign the website to an advanced, premium-quality professional level. Enhancements should include: a richer hero section with animated text or subtle motion effects, an enhanced services section with detailed feature bullet lists and a call-to-action per service card, a 'Why Choose Us' or trust-building section highlighting reliability, experience, and quality guarantees, improved typography hierarchy using the existing font configuration, polished hover and transition animations throughout, and a more visually compelling overall layout while preserving the teal/cream brand palette.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section includes animated or visually engaging text/motion effects.
Each service card displays a bullet list of features and a contact/CTA link.
A new trust/why-choose-us section is added between Services and Contact.
All interactive elements (buttons, cards, nav links) have smooth hover and transition animations.
Typography hierarchy is clear with distinct heading, subheading, and body styles.
The teal and cream brand palette is preserved and consistently applied.
The page remains fully responsive on mobile and desktop viewports.

requirements.text: Update the hero background image to a more vivid, high-quality professional cleaning environment scene that better reflects a premium brand, and generate a 'Why Choose Us' section background image with a subtle, clean texture or abstract light pattern.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero background image is replaced with the new premium version.
A background image is used in the 'Why Choose Us' section.
Both images are served from frontend/public/assets/generated.
Images load correctly and do not cause layout shifts.

constraints: Preserve the existing teal and cream brand color palette.
Do not remove either phone number; both must remain accessible as tel: links.
Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep all backend files unchanged â€” no backend logic is required for this request.
nonGoals: Adding an online booking or reservation system.
Adding a contact form with backend submission.
Changing the company name or branding identity.
Any backend data storage or API endpoints.

required: Premium professional cleaning team at work in a bright modern interior, warm natural light, teal accents (hero-bg.dim_1440x600.png)
Subtle light abstract geometric texture with soft teal and cream tones, clean and minimal (why-choose-us-bg.dim_1440x400.png)
edits: Enhance vibrancy and contrast, sharpen details (hero-bg.dim_1440x600.png > hero-bg.dim_1440x600.png)
Slightly brighten and add a soft warm overlay (services-bg.dim_1440x400.png > services-bg.dim_1440x400.png)
